Name: srvid
column6: the oid of the foreign server that contains this mapping

Name: umuser
column6: oid of the local role being mapped, 0 if the user mapping is public

Name: usename
column6: name of the local user to be mapped

Name: umoptions
column6: user mapping specific options, as "keyword=value" strings, if the current user is the owner of the foreign server, else null
